author: wander099
title: Freebie
review:
I got this as a freebie from the lego site when I ordered a set.  This is not something I would ever actually spend money on directly.  I was disappointed because yet again lego got it wrong.  Sensei Wu is from the Ninjago theme and is supposed to be the master of the ninjas or something.  However, he is wearing what appears to be a karate outfit and a Chinese peasant's hat.  Ninjas typically wore darker colours so as to blend into their surroundings and were trained in ninjitsu/ninjutsu, not karate (karate has a different origin).

This reminds me of the previous ninja theme in which lego made the error of calling one of the ninjas in my Shanghai Surprise set a 'shogun', which is very historically inaccurate (the title shogun was a powerful military rank given to one samurai in all of Japan and at certain points in history the shogun was more powerful than the emperor).  It should be noted that for some reason this ninja was dressed like a samurai and was being rowed around by two red ninjas (didn't really make much sense).

Oh, and heads up, if your set is back-ordered the key chain is sent in advance so don't get excited that it is shipping early because it is just the key chain.
